password.length: Password has to be at least 8 characters
password.lowerCase: Password has to include at least one small letter
password.number: Password has to include at least one number
password.specialCharacter: Password has to include at least one of special character:
password.upperCase: Password has to include at least one capital letter

join.text: You want to be part of ? Sign up to our mailing list and we'll keep you up to date on our events and other news from the CORRECTIV.Faktenforum. We'll also send you an invitation to our Discord server where you can exchange with other and get to know our team.
join.title: Sign up to our Community

learn.text: The CORRECTIV.Faktenforum brings together all those who want to take action against disinformation - online and on the ground. We organise networking events and offer on-site workshops with local organisations. Check out our event calendar below. For more information, please contact us at faktenforum{'@'}correctiv.org
learn.title: Get to know us

submit.text: Are you concerned about a possibly false statement you came across? Or are you uncertain whether a claim is true? Then submit the suspicious content with the original file or a link to the original file here. Have you already found initial sources that refute the claim? Feel free to add them!
submit.title: Submit a suspicious claim

chatbot.description: Did you come across a suspicious claim? Perhaps the team of CORRECTIV.Factcheck has already looked into the alleged misinformation. You can send a query to our database via the CORRECTIV.chatbot. The tool is not omniscient, but only answers questions that are documented in our database of more than 3,000 fact check articles from CORRECTIV.
chatbot.title: Ask the CORRECTIV.Checkbot

header.description: Targeted misinformation is being used to divide our society. CORRECTIV.Faktenforum is a community for everyone who wants to engage in a fact-based dialogue and wants to counter disinformation - regardless of previous journalistic experience.
header.title: Fact-checking as a community

news.description: The CORRECTIV.Faktenforum is an independent community organised by CORRECTIV. You can read the latest articles of colleagues from our fact-checking team here or on the website correctiv.org. Is a video real or manipulated? Was a quote actually said this way? Or has a statistic been taken out of context? At CORRECTIV.factcheck, 13 journalists tackle these and other questions every day. Get an impression of their work.
news.title: The latest articles of CORRECTIV.Faktencheck

label.title: Give your claim a meaningful title

link.label: Insert a Link
link.title: Enter a link to a file to upload

submitPage.request: Can you provide some additional information?

source.subtitle: You can submit a source supporting or refuting the claim. Add the original text of your source or a link to the source. Describe why the source is important to your fact-check.
source.text: You can submit a source supporting or refuting the claim. Add the original text of your source or a link to the source. Describe why the source is important to your fact-check.
source.title: Submit a source

submitPage.text: You can submit a claim in three different ways: upload a file, provide a direct link to a file or escribe a misinformation you witnessed. Leave your email address so we can get back to you!
submitPage.title: Submit a claim
